decision_conditions: The proposed development fails to comply with Schedule 2, Article 3, Part 1, Class A , paragraph A.4.3 (b) of the of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended), as the developer has provided insufficient information to enable the authority to establish whether or not the materials used in any exterior work for the proposed extension are of similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse.

The authority has insufficient information to determine whether or not the proposal complies with Schedule 2, Article 3, Part 1, Class A, paragraph A.3 (a) of the of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension, which would extend beyond the rear wall of the original house by 4.00 metres, for which the maximum height would be 3.50 metres, and for which the height of the eaves would be 3.00 metres
